name: UIDocumentBrowserViewController
desc: A view controller for browsing and performing actions on documents stored locally and in the cloud.

items.name: allowedContentTypes
items.desc: The document types that the browser can open.

items.name: allowsDocumentCreation
items.desc: A Boolean value that determines whether the document browser can create new documents.

items.name: allowsPickingMultipleItems
items.desc: A Boolean value that determines whether the user can select and open more than one document at a time.

items.name: browserUserInterfaceStyle
items.desc: The visual style used by the document browser.

items.name: UIDocumentBrowserViewController.BrowserUserInterfaceStyle
items.desc: Styles that define the document browser's appearance.

items.name: additionalLeadingNavigationBarButtonItems
items.desc: Additional bar button items that the document browser displays on the leading side of its navigation bar.

items.name: additionalTrailingNavigationBarButtonItems
items.desc: Additional bar button items that the document browser displays on the trailing side of its navigation bar.

items.name: shouldShowFileExtensions
items.desc: A Boolean value that determines whether the browser always shows file extensions.

items.name: localizedCreateDocumentActionTitle
items.desc: The title for the Create Document button.

items.name: defaultDocumentAspectRatio
items.desc: The aspect ratio for the Create Document button.

items.name: transitionController
items.desc: Creates a transition controller that provides the standard system-loading and segue animations for the document browser.

items.name: transitionController
items.desc: Creates a transition controller that provides the standard system-loading and segue animations for the document browser.

items.name: UIDocumentBrowserError.Code
items.desc: The error codes for errors raised by the document browser.

items.name: UIDocumentBrowserErrorDomain
items.desc: The error domain for errors raised by the document browser.
